article.description: — Darius McGhee had 27 points as Liberty got past Bethune-Cookman 59-51 on Tuesday night.
article.headline: McGhee leads Liberty over Bethune-Cookman 59-51
article.story: DAYTONA BEACH, Fla. -- — Darius McGhee had 27 points as Liberty got past Bethune-Cookman 59-51 on Tuesday night. Keegan McDowell had 17 points for Liberty (2-3). Joe French had 25 points and seven rebounds for the Wildcats (1-5). Damani McEntire added 10 points. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/hub/college-basketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
